Key Match Events: White Sox won their fourth straight at home and second straight series at home
Benintendi's one-out single in the 10th against Jos√© Quijada scored Miguel Vargas, who started the inning at second
Pre-Game Insights: The White Sox are trying to avoid becoming the first team in baseball history to lose 60 games at home in one season
The team is looking to build on their wins and make the remaining games meaningful
Post-Match Reflections: The team celebrated their win with a boisterous postgame joy in the clubhouse
Players and the manager expressed their focus on the game and not letting external factors affect their performance
Miscellaneous Highlights: The White Sox moved Chris Flexen to Thursday's home finale and ace Garrett Crochet to Friday in Detroit
The American League Central rivalries are going strong, even in the face of 121 losses
Others: The team is looking to have some fun and win some games and go to Detroit to try to spoil some games for them
Luis Robert Jr. talked about his statistical drop off this season and tied those struggles directly into that of the team
